title: ResearchBunny
description:
ResearchBunny transforms dense academic research papers into captivating audio journeys - save time, spark curiosity & revolutionise your learning with AI. We provide Multilingual engaging audio briefs (more than 25+ languages) and features like AI bunny, AI-Powered Collections. One can also promote your research through embedded widget. (Isn't that great)

Join us and get access to over 10,000+ hours of Research content in 25+ different fields. 🔗 researchbunny.com/?promo=phunt
